text: Dina Powell McCormick (Dina Habib , ; born June 12, 1973)"B'day: Dina Powell" , Politico Playbook, June 12, 2017. is an American financial executive, philanthropist and political advisor. She is best known for having been the United States Deputy National Security Advisor for StrategyMargaret Brennan and Jacqueline Alemany, "Dina Powell promoted to deputy national security adviser" , CBS News, March 15, 2017. to President Donald Trump. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:American philanthropists Category:American diplomats Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Politicians from New York City Category:People from Cairo Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Dina Powell
